greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: fraction of integers having k of the first n positive integers as divisors is T(n,k)/A003418(n).
comment: Sum of entries in n-th row is A003418(n), the least common multiple of integers 1 to n.
program: rowd(n) = {v = vector(n); for (k=1, lcmn(n), d = divisors(k); v[sum(j=1, #d, d[j]<=n)]++;); v;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Apr 29 2017
results.author: _Matthew Vandermast_, Jun 19 2004
